name: Cargus (almarz)
description:
Cargus is a puzzle game for singleplayer inside a computer program.

In a dystopian future, a program manufactured by the corporation that governs the world is used to charge machines that work alongside humans.

You have been designated as a "volunteer" to operate that program. Will you be able to complete all the tasks and become a citizen in your own right?

NOTE: When playing in web version, toggle to full screen.

Controls
  • Browser/Windows

     Movement - WASD/Arrows

  • Android

     Movement - Swipe on screen

Installation

For Windows, download the zip file and unzip it. Then execute the main executable file.

For Android download the .apk file. Then execute the apk in your download folder and accept installation when asking.
